1: I am heard promptly when I call.
2: My prayer rises like incense; my lifted hands offer devotion
3: I keep watch over my mouth and speak wisely.
4: My heart pursues goodness with the upright, savoring simple, honest living.
5: I welcome wise correction; it benefits and strengthens me.
6: Sweet words are heard and appreciated
7: Resilience gathers scattered pieces into renewed unity and strength.
8: I look to the Divine and live in complete trust
9: Move safely past every trap and snare.
10: I walk in safety and freedom beyond snares.
